items.sentence: It never occurred to me that Tom wouldn\'t come.
It wouldn\'t surprise me if Tom didn\'t show up.
It\'s a secret. You can\'t let anyone else know.
That\'s one of the things that I like about Tom.
Tom thought of the many ways he could kill Mary.
Tom thought that Mary might try to kill herself.
Tom thought that Mary was having money problems.
Tom thought that Mary was likely to get the job.
Tom thought that Mary would do that right thing.
I\'m going to take a bath as soon as I get home.
